hanzi-su-wiki:
瀬

Значения

Мелководье; мель, стремнина

Мнемоника

На перекатах гребцы бросают весла, полагаясь 頼 на воду 氵, которая сама вынесет их на безопасное место.

Варианты

濑, 瀨

rtega_mnemonic:
瀨瀨RS
濑濑		瀬swift current, rapids
  • water 氵 like a bundle of pages 賴/頼
heisig_constituent: rapids, water, water droplets, water pistol, trust, bundle, Chaplin, tree, wood, mouth, head, page, one, ceiling, drop, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
koohiiStory1: You need complete trust in your water guide to attempt Class 5 rapids.
koohiiStory2: You can never trust the water in the rapids, it will do everything it can to pull you under. Imagine a line of natives with bundles upon their heads all fighting the rapids to cross the river.
jp_example_words: 瀬戸物(せともの): earthenware, crockery, china
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A tsunami hits a bundle of geoducks, swirling around their weird shapes, and creating rapids! The rapids are so violent, some of the geoducks break out of the bundle and get washed into the shallows.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture the bundle of geoducks getting smashed by the tsunami, breaking apart, and getting tossed around in the rapids.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: After being washed through the rapids and into the shallows, the living geoducks are screaming “Save (せ) me! Save me!” They need to be saved from the water, and you are the only one who can save them. You gotta run over and help them out.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine reaching into the shallows and saving the geoducks as they scream, “Save me! Save me!” into your ear.
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 頼 (たのむ、たよる、ライ просьба, доверие).
Ru_Radicals: ｜, ハ, 汁 (суп), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина), 頁 (страница)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you can't rely (頼) on the water (氵) in the rapids

瀬字的基本解释

瀬
lài
同“濑”。

瀬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lài］
［《集韻》落蓋切，去泰，來。］
亦作“瀬1”。“濑1”的繁体字。
(1)沙石上流过的水。
(2)急流。
(3)浅水沙石滩。
(4)通“厲”。
(5)水名。濑水。在广西壮族自治区，即荔江，源出荔浦县永福里，东至平乐县与漓江合。
(6)水名。濑水。在江苏省，溧水的别名。

瀬字的康熙字典解释

瀬字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Set
lài
Same as "Se".
Set
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lài］
["Ji Yun" Go to Thailand, come. ]
Also known as "Set 1". The traditional characters of "Sai 1".
(1) Water flowing over sand and rocks.
(2) Rapids.
(3) Shallow water sandy beach.
(4) Through "strength".
(5) Water name. Sesui. In the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, Lijiang, it originates from Yongfuli, Lipu County, and ends at Pingle County and the Lijiang River in the east.
(6) Water name. Sesui. In Jiangsu Province, the alias of Lishui.

Name meaning

lài
яп. вм. 濑
Radicals: 氵, 束, 頁  (tsunami, bundle, geoduck)
Meaning Mnemonic
A tsunami hits a bundle of geoducks, swirling around their weird shapes, and creating rapids! The rapids are so violent, some of the geoducks break out of the bundle and get washed into the shallows.
Picture the bundle of geoducks getting smashed by the tsunami, breaking apart, and getting tossed around in the rapids.
Reading Mnemonic
After being washed through the rapids and into the shallows, the living geoducks are screaming “Save (せ) me! Save me!” They need to be saved from the water, and you are the only one who can save them. You gotta run over and help them out.
Imagine reaching into the shallows and saving the geoducks as they scream, “Save me! Save me!” into your ear.
